alert.note: Alert for Brown; Clark; Day; Spink (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 8:30PM MDT until June 20 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Day County in northeastern South Dakota... Southeastern Brown County in northeastern South Dakota... Northern Clark County in northeastern South Dakota... Northeastern Spink County in northeastern South Dakota... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 930 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Crandall, or 19 miles northwest of Clark, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Crocker around 940 PM CDT. Lily around 945 PM CDT. Bristol and Butler around 950 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Webster. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
